abilities.name: Herald of the Apocalypse
abilities.rule: While an enemy unit is within 6" of this model, in the Battle-shock step of your opponent’s Command phase, if that enemy unit is below its Starting Strength, it must take a Battle-shock test. This ability cannot cause a unit to take two Battle-shock tests in the same phase.

abilities.name: Head Taker
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, each time this model’s unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model’s unit and roll one D6 for each model in this model’s unit that is within Engagement Range of that enemy unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.
